content.question: The architects of the Palace at Versailles asserted the absolute power of the French monarchy through which of the following means?

choices.label: The palace and gardens were built on an east-west axis to create a symbolic parallel between the king and the Sun
The design included a fortified wall to surround the palace as Â a demonstration of royal strength and military might.
Reception rooms in the palace were open to the public via seating in surrounding arcades.
Walls in the palace were mirrored for the purpose of reflecting the image of the king from every vantage point.

content.answer: The palace and gardens were built on an east-west axis to create a symbolic parallel between the king and the Sun
